strengths: Exceptional mobility and reinforcement via Orbital Drop
Strong planet control and retention with infantry focus
Flexible strategies for both aggressive and defensive play
weaknesses: Command token scarcity — always needs more tokens
Struggles against other infantry factions late-game (Arborec)
tips: Prioritize Mecatol Rex acquisition and control
Aggressively take objective-relevant planets over first two rounds
Focus on high-influence planets to manage command token shortage
Use Orbital Drop to reinforce critical planets strategically
Deploy small mobile fleets with abundant infantry — hard to assault
Build second production center if possible

techPaths.name: Blue + Green
techPaths.note: Primary path; Gravity Drive and Spec Ops II are urgent priorities
